document_data.name: House Amarillis
document_data.mainbody: '''House Amarillis''' was a [[moon elf]] house descended from [[Kethryllia Amarillis]], whose body was interred in the [[Hall of the Ancients]] in [[Leuthilspar]]. The house had no leader and its members tended not to specialise in any particular vocation. The house was known for its members' tendency to leave [[Evermeet]] to explore [[Faer√ªn]]. The house's estate in Leuthilspar consisted of an exotic walled castle.
document_data.Members: * '''[[Kethryllia Amarillis]]''', founder of the house, deceased as of [[1368 DR]].
